title: Statement of area of the holding by triangulation method from a licensed surveyor or architect with
clause_text: Statement of area of the holding by triangulation method from a licensed surveyor or architect with an affidavit from the owner certifying the boundaries of the plot and area in the form prescribed by the Commissioner; Affidavit from the owner regarding non-holding of contiguous land to the site under development.
